mapper.select: select id, business_key, project_id, project_name, project_no, stage_name, step_id, step_name, contract_no, form_no, review_type, design_men, check_man, charge_man, information_source, issue_content, solution_content, total_designer, charge_men, total_designer_name, charge_men_name, is_deleted, creator, creator_name, gmt_create, gmt_modified, remark, process_instance_id, is_process_end from five_ed_quality_issue where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select id, business_key, project_id, project_name, project_no, stage_name, step_id, step_name, contract_no, form_no, review_type, design_men, check_man, charge_man, information_source, issue_content, solution_content, total_designer, charge_men, total_designer_name, charge_men_name, is_deleted, creator, creator_name, gmt_create, gmt_modified, remark, process_instance_id, is_process_end from five_ed_quality_issue
